text: Went to Immersion booth. The demo looks great. Nice work, everyone.
<@U030TQFR3>: FYI David B isn't here but Mandi is.
She wasn't at the booth but will supposedly be back by 1:30. I may swing back later today or tomorrow to catch her. I left my card with the person (Linda) who showed me the demo.
And in case anyone is wondering they are tucked away in a meeting room and it's definitely a by appointment only room.
Linda said the wearable demo has been showing well. The haptic a were really nice.
(I had to promise that I wasn't going to tweet that so don't tweet that) v
Yay, I'm glad they like it!
<!channel>: Spoke with Mandi. She's in good spirits. The demo had been running for two days straight without any issues.
Yes! Fantastic news, good work crew.
They hit a small glitch today that was solved by a restart. She thought it was super impressive that they hadn't needed to restart until today.
Her hotel doesn't have functioning wifi and she's in event mode. I suggested we regroup early next week once she's back to normal.
Their MWC strategy is to assess what's possible between now and then, whether it's video, leveraging old code, or simpler scope.
It may become any of those and I reassured her that we're here to help the best we can.
Overall our work is shining through and they're happy with us.
Thanks again everyone for all the hard work.
